title: 🪗 "Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced." - James Baldwin
content:
Make a "guessing game" where there is a target number, and as the user makes guesses, the output returns higher or lower until the user is correct.

Example usage:

Guess the number!
> 10
higher
> 20
higher
> 30
lower
> 25
higher
> 27
Correct! You won in 5 guesses!
